lead_paragraph: The Defense Ministry said the raids were part of an operation seeking guerrillas blamed for the Dec. 21 slaying of the Caquetá State governor.
snippet: The Defense Ministry said the raids were part of an operation seeking guerrillas blamed for the Dec. 21 slaying of the Caquetá State governor.

headline.main: Colombia: Rebels Killed and Captured in Raids
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Rebels Killed and Captured In Raids
